Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/9/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Traded from New York (Y) to Chicago on 4/11/1986 (Going to CHC: P Ron Guidry, 3B Jim Leyritz, CF Chuck Carr. Going to NYY: P Joe Kraemer)...
Injured on 5/1/1987 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/1989 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/4/1991, off Mike Stanton (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1992, off John Henry Johnson (ATL)...
